message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I really appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm trying to stay within a tight budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
